p: Research using ethanol extract from leaves of Montrichardia linifera (Arruda) Schott showed moderate antiplasmodial activity (10 < IC 50 < 100 μg/mL) [ 30], which is below that found in this study (IC 50 = 1.21 µg/mL). However, work with Artemisia turcomanica extract obtained antiplasmodial activity with IC 50 and IC90 values of 0.90 ± 0.27 mg/mL and 1.62 ± 0.68 mg/mL, respectively [ 31].
